content: Please arrange the teams based on their cumulative points, given the scores of Team 1 with 30 points, Team 2 with 40 points, Team 3 with 50 points, and Team 4 with 20 points.

Sure, here's the arrangement of the teams based on their cumulative points from highest to lowest:

1. Team 3 - 50 points
2. Team 2 - 40 points
3. Team 1 - 30 points
4. Team 4 - 20 points
